snippet.title: 🥒 PICKLE-POCALYPSE 🥒 v1.3.0 UPDATE TRAILER! | Indie Unity 2D Game
snippet.description:
NEW UPDATE out now for PICKLE-POCALYPSE, adding a new level, all-direction shooting, weapon & health pickups, and much more! 

PICKLE-POCALYPSE is a goofy 2D arcade shooter game about heroic cucumbers fighting for survival in a world of zombified pickles. Featuring a varied lineup of 5 weapons and fun & frantic gameplay for 1-4 players. How long will you survive in the PICKLE-POCALYPSE?

🥒 Fight zombie pickles with 1-4 players in local multiplayer 🥒
🔫 Varied line-up of wacky weapons 🔫
👪 Play co-op or PvP 👪
🎮 Out now for FREE on Xbox One and Series X|S! 🎮

Gameplay & code by Theo Clarke
with art & voice acting by Chloe Page

https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/pickle-pocalypse/9mzcdt6zzkw2
https://theoclarkeart.weebly.com/pickle-pocalypse.html 
https://theoclarke.itch.io/
